name: Kate Barrett: The Minigames (Volume 2)
description:
Another pack full of chaos and madness.... From the twisted mind behind READY PLAYER FUCK!!!

Nine (9) minigames I made throughout 2019. I made one other, Last Game Of The Decade (Last GOTD 2019) which is not included because it was released seperately, here!

  1. Elon Musk's Incredible 3D Hyperloop Experience
  2. The Mystery of Glow-Peak
  3. Smash James Wood's Hollywood Star
  4. Handle Me At My Worst
  5. Newcastle Milkshake Rampage (game where you throw milkshakes at nigel farage)
  6. Just Scream
  7. Mess With The U.S (Go to the U.S and mess with it)
  8. Super Relaxing Planet
  9. Quantum Teleporter Smasher

The biggest games in here are Mystery of Glow-Peak, a short adventure game with a save feature, and Super Relaxing Planet, a free-roaming game on a little planet. Many of the others are bite-sized.

The saves appear as text files in the game's folder. They all begin with an underscore so they go to the top of the folder.

Controls for each game are usually detailed in the game itself. But if you're stuck for what to do: arrow keys, Z,X,C, esc, are the default buttons in a lot of them.
